comments.body: I also made a discovery, every time you receive neg tag, then posting to discuss about it will result in more tags, and every time you post to discuss your achievements you'd also receive more merits.Â  And both of them are related to signature campaigns.There is also another discovery, some DT members whom we have no idea from where they got there, actually use scare tactics to persuade people who to include or exclude from their trust list, like it's any of their business. Btw, news flash discovery, you can no longer delete this topic, lolAnd it's all thanks to 10 DTs. Taking this forum as hostage, now that their sig spam business is getting banned, they all act like decent and good people. Lol
